backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with types and maps for communities, profiles, events, constructions, authorization, and exposes profile and community‑scoped profile management APIs.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature requirements, related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with AppLayout and Toaster providers.
UI button for contributing a construction part with authentication, membership, event validation, and backend submission handling.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout with header, navigation, AuthStatus, optional deployment retry banner, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Displays authentication state, showing loading, sign-in, or signed-in UI with principal and sign‑out button.
frontend/src/components/AvatarMarker.tsx: Renders a positioned avatar marker with initials and color derived from principal, optionally showing a display name.
frontend/src/components/BuildChoicePromp: Shows a modal asking the user whether they want to participate in a build event with Yes/No actions.
frontend/src/components/CommunityMemberP: Provides a dialog for viewing and editing a community member’s profile with fields for name, services, activities, and links.
frontend/src/components/ConstructionOver: Displays construction progress and completed building count in an overlay with progress bar and status badges.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentFailur: Modal showing deployment error summary and expandable technical details, with copy and download actions.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentRetryB: Shows a failure banner with retry controls and access to detailed diagnostics for deployment errors.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Wraps content and requires user authentication, showing a sign‑in alert if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with react-query hooks to fetch profiles, communities, members, maps, admin status, and event data.
frontend/src/hooks/useRetryableDeploymen: Implements a retryable deployment hook with backoff, status tracking, diagnostics, and session persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/buildEventChoice.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears per-community build event choices in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/deploymentAttempt.ts: Handles persistence of the last deployment attempt in sessionStorage for retry support.
frontend/src/lib/deploymentDiagnostics.t: Normalizes deployment errors into readable diagnostics and supports text report generation and download.
frontend/src/lib/errorMessage.ts: Extracts user-friendly error messages, summaries, authorization detection, and raw details from unknown errors.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Parses and formats ICP Principal values with validation and optional shortening.
frontend/src/lib/retryWithBackoff.ts: Provides a generic async retry helper with backoff delays and error aggregation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CommunitiesPage.tsx: Lists communities, checks admin status, and provides a form and mutation to create new communities.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityDetailPage.t: Shows community details, member list, profiles, and allows authenticated users to join the community.
frontend/src/pages/MapGamePage.tsx: Displays the community map, active events, member locations, and handles building choices and construction state.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileMePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view, edit, and save their own profile with display name, bio, and links.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePublicPage.tsx: Loads and displays another user's public profile or an error if not found.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve values in sessionStorage, and manage persisted URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color system, container settings, custom animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s schema version, current state summary, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features.
